title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister agriculture food marine) order 2025

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. Barry Cassidy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Barry Cassidy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine with 
effect from 24 January 2025.
text_norm: 2 barry cassidy particular whose address deposited office department agriculture food marine appointed special adviser minister agriculture food marine effect 24 january 2025

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. Brian Purcell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Brian Purcell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine with 
effect from 3 March 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 

1 July, 2025. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Tánaiste. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [294] 3
